Trade/Device Name(s): Simplexa T Flu AB & RSV Direct
Simplexa Flu AB & RSV Positive Control Pack
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel nucleic acid assay system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Simplexa Flu A/B & RSV Direct assay and Positive Control Pack for qualitative detection of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA using multiplex real-time RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the differential diagnosis of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV infections in patients with respiratory symptoms using nasopharyngeal swabs on the 3M Integrated Cycler; not intended to detect influenza C or serve as sole basis for treatment decisions.
